description:
The Inter-High preliminaries begin as though swallowing the hopes of every player.
If Peco defeats his noisy quarterfinal opponent, he`ll remain in the top 4 and advance to nationals. Peco`s quarterfinal opponent is Sakuma AKA "Akuma".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est effrayant de sacrifier sa vie pour le ping pong
Staking Your Life On Table Tennis Is Revolting
Takkyuu ni Jinsei o Kakeru Nante Kimi ga Warui
卓球に人生をかけるなんて気味が悪い
